context.name: FAB Defense AG43 Tactical Pistol Grip
context.excerpt: The AG-43 State-of-the-Art Tactical Pistol Grip from FAB Defense enhances grip control, reduces slipping and wrist fatigue, improving overall control during firing sequences.
context.content:
The AG-43 State-of-the-Art Tactical Pistol Grip from FAB Defense enhances grip control, reduces slipping and wrist fatigue, improving overall control during firing sequences.

 

AG43 Tactical Pistol Grip Advantages:

Ergonomic non-slip design
Finger grooves and backstrap shape for enhanced, more comfortable grip
Extended beavertail enables higher, firmer hold, for superior weapon handling
Readily accessible storage compartment with tight-sealing hinged door

 

AG43 Tactical Pistol Grip Compatibility:

M-16 / SR-25 / AR-10 / AR-15 Variants
